root.name: Playmobil Circus
root.description: Features Play in the Playmobil universe, including characters, animals, and settingPlay and unlock 16 different exciting and hilarious circus actsPlay with up to 4 friends in 2 different immersive multiplayermodes including "Versus" and "Teamwork".
